item.description:
EAST COAST GRILL SPECIAL EVENT:CAMBRIDGE BREWING COMPANY BEER
Brew master, neighbor and old friend Will Meyers will be bringing 8 of his beers from down the street to pair with East Coast Grill’s classic beer foods. Dishes like smoked duck with apricot mustard will be paired with Cambridge Brewing Company’s Great Pumpkin Ale.

Check out the a la cart menu on their website www.eastcoastgrill.net/main/specialevents.htm Click on A LA CARTE MENU to see the fabulous deals.

Although this is a Monday night...I anticipate it will be crowded for this event so it would help if those of you who can...please get there early. There is a large table for us which seat 15 for those who will be ordering food from the "special menu". For those just wanting to drink beer...the Cambridge brewing Company will be set up in the front room serving Beer Flights for you to sample the different beers.

The East Coast Grill is normally rather pricey so this is a great way to enjoy the fabulous food on "special menu" price with $4.50 for a 16oz glass of beer!!
item.name: East Coast Grill Teams up with Cambridge Brewery
